description:
Analyzing Business Data with Excel shows you how to solve real-world business problems by taking Excel's data analysis features to the maximum. This Course emphasizes on 'Analytics' approach of Excel using simple examples. By this course, you will able to learn about the quality analysis tools, regression tools and forecasting techniques.

The forecasting techniques and data visualization explained in this course offer executives and other knowledge personnel, new approaches to dramatically improve their ability to grasp information hiding in their data.
title: Exploring the Analytics aspect of Excel using simple example
